participant_1.background:
My most prized possession is my comfy couch, where I can relax and enjoy a bowl of pistachio ice cream.
i love to play basketball.
i babysit for the woman who lives next door.
I love Christmas because I get to spend time with my family and eat lots of delicious food.
I find that reading about the history of the world and its philosophy helps me put my own troubles into perspective.

participant_2.background:
I used to go to the library a lot more often, but now I prefer to read books on my Kindle.
I like to relax by looking through my antique collection.
I like to go on websites about cats and fashion.
i ride a unicycle.
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.

content.text: I love to read, and I have a blog where I share my thoughts and opinions with the world.
That's really cool! I like to read too, but I don't have a blog.
You should start one! It's a great way to connect with other people who share your interests.
Maybe I will! What kind of things do you write about on your blog?
I write about everything from my personal life to current events. I also like to share reviews of books that I've read.
That sounds really interesting! I'd love to check it out sometime.
Sure, I'll send you a link.
Thanks! What else do you like to do for fun?
I love to go on walks, and I also like to ride my unicycle.
Riding a unicycle sounds like a lot of fun! I've never tried it before.
It's actually not that hard to learn! I taught myself how to ride one when I was in college.
Maybe I'll give it a try someday. What else do you like to do?
I like to go to the library, and I also like to go on websites about cats and fashion.
You seem like a really interesting person! I'd love to get to know you better.
Me too! We should hang out sometime.
That sounds like a great idea!
